question: Recently, our Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi released a book titled "The Birds of Banni Grassland". The Banni Grassland is located in which state of India?
explanation: The Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi released a book titled "The Birds of Banni Grassland". The Book is a compilation of the research work, relating to more than 250 species of birds found in the Banni area of Kutch, Gujarat.
